meanings.definition: Not able to be reached or contacted.
meanings.sent1: The top shelf was unapproachable for the little girl.
meanings.sent2: The mountain peak looked unapproachable from afar.
meanings.sent3: The cat's favorite toy rolled under the couch, becoming unapproachable.
meanings.sent4: Her dream of becoming a famous singer felt unapproachable at times.
meanings.sent5: The castle on the hill appeared unapproachable, surrounded by a deep moat.

meanings.definition: Not friendly or easy to talk to.
meanings.sent1: The stern teacher seemed unapproachable to the students.
meanings.sent2: The security guard appeared unapproachable with his serious expression.
meanings.sent3: The grumpy old man's unapproachable demeanor melted when he saw the puppy.
meanings.sent4: Her boss's unapproachable attitude made it hard to ask for time off.
meanings.sent5: The unapproachable bouncer at the club intimidated the partygoers.
